name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
[Beware of recruitment scams during the summer vacation]
On July 13, an intermediary in Wuhan fabricated job positions to defraud summer students from all over the country to come to Wuhan.
Some students from Jilin were attracted by the job of "eight hours of subway security inspection with a daily salary of 100 yuan" and took a train for more than 20 hours to Wuhan. However, after paying the medical examination fee at Wuhan Hansha Hospital, the intermediary immediately lost contact.
Because the amount was not high and could not meet the filing standard, there was no way to complain, and now they can only live on the streets in Wuhan.
It is reported that there are currently dozens of people who have been deceived. Only for a few dozen yuan in kickbacks, students from all over the country were deceived to Wuhan. This kind of case of defrauding kickbacks for medical examinations in the name of recruitment has also occurred frequently in the past.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, some netizens discovered that the official website of Moscow State University lists "Taiwan" and "China" separately.
One netizen commented: "Why is Russia not condemned for repeatedly making mistakes in insulting China? Because they really insult China."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens ask for help
[Beware] The latest Telegram hacking scam
The scammers will disguise themselves as the official website, claiming that it is the account protection function of Telegram, and ask you to go to this website to enter the verification code and double password, and then log in to your device to continue to send messages to your friends.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 15, CCTV News Channel showed the Snow Lion flag when reporting on the floods in India.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 12, the Wubao County Party School opened a "clean kitchen" and "clean meals" for students.
In recent days, there has been a heated discussion about the rich and low-priced canteens within the system. "The canteen within the system gave me the motivation to take the civil service exam" once topped the Weibo hot search list.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 15, in a certain place in Guangdong, a citizen was taking a stool to cool off on the roadside, but it was confiscated by the urban management. The citizen asked for the chair and was asked to show the receipt.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The online rumor said the incident happened in Nanning, Guangxi, but some netizens found that the license plates of the urban management law enforcement vehicles in the video and the private cars parked nearby were all Guangdong license plates.
Subsequently, the Nanning City Urban Management Comprehensive Administrative Law Enforcement Bureau issued a statement on its official website stating that the incident did not occur in Nanning, Guangxi.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beware of the following phishing messages:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
"Alas! Capital!"
On July 15, the Education Bureau of Tengchong City, Yunnan Province responded to the establishment of an "education group", which triggered a barrage of criticism from citizens.
Citizens accused Tenghui Company of monopolizing the food and accommodation of all primary, middle and high school students in the city. The canteen is expensive, of poor quality and not enough to eat, and there are often cigarette butts in the food.
On the surface, it is for education and for children, but in fact it is for monopoly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 16, a netizen received a strange flyer on the streets of Chengdu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
[Dabai's Tragedy]
On the evening of July 16, in a place in Northeast China, a man wearing an isolation suit was "enforcing the law" on the street, and was then taken away by the police who rushed over.
A few months ago, he was the absolute authority who controlled the life and death of the community, but now he has become a mental patient.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A company in Guangzhou claims that its general manager follows the "616" work system
working 6 days a week and 16 hours a day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contributions
On July 16, netizens were discussing "I used to think he was a good guy".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contributions from netizens
On July 15, due to the recent "abortion" controversy, all scenes of Cai Xukun in a variety show were "erased"
Netizens were surprised by the meticulous coding done by the TV station in the later stage. Cai Xukun, who is in the C position, seems to have never participated in this show at all...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens corrected: It has always been like this here

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I won’t say more
When the other party asks you to download an APP, it is a scammer.
